ygData.subject: RE: New to the List )
ygData.msgSnippet: Really, High Quality Lion Pelts or HQ cat pelts off of Lions.  There is a big difference, especially to Ged Twigborn.  I d love to know how you easily got a HQ
ygData.messageBody:
Really, High Quality Lion Pelts or HQ cat pelts off of Lions. There is a
big difference, especially to Ged Twigborn. I'd love to know how you easily
got a HQ Lion Pelt ;-)

Kitasi the eager listener

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Gifford [mailto:giffords@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 3:35 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New to the List )


From: "Sean Gifford" <giffords@...>

I have never heard of different qualities of "skins" but High Quality Lion
pelts are easy to find.
----- Original Message -----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 11:44 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New to the List )


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

Hail and welcome!

I am in the same boat - full set of bronze and encumbered without any loot.

Dimensional pockets (magician) and Spirit Pouches (shaman) - can help
anything you carry in them is weightless. Trouble is they go away when you
camp - so make sure they are empty. I have even considered whacking the PoD
and camping my corpse so I don't have to hassle finding a mag or shaman
every time I enter the game.

Play anthem or chant along with selos and it boosts str if you get
encumbered with loot.

Ruby viel has str booster - kinda pricy but what the heck.

If you have full bronze at your level, I would guess that money is not a
problem for you. I am not looting any more except really good stuffs or for
some rare item - HQ LION skin for example - 3 weeks now and cant find one or
even buy one. Sometimes when I have to beg my way into a party, I tell em
that they can have all the loots and all I wants is the xp and the rare lion
if we get one.

Sylly
Bard of the 15th level
a.k.a. Robo-Bard
camped out somewhere on Innoruuk
